title: Dugong! Dugong! (A)
creator_credit: Australian Museum, Howard Hughes and New South Wales Film Corporation
brief_description: Commencing with the telling of an Aboriginal legend about the dugong, the film then shows the hunting, killing and cooking of the dugong by the Aborigines living on Mornington Island. Hunting is now done by motor boat as opposed to the traditional method using nets, which is re-enacted.
